text:
Good morning! Our team is in the process of introducing newly refreshed Email endpoints into private beta and we are looking for volunteers to help us test these endpoints and provide feedback:

We are kick starting the process with a new more consistent Subscription preferences API (previous Email Subscriptions)

If you are interested in participating in the feedback period, please fill ou this form: <https://forms.gle/12fhFMgYNmjgMqff6>

Thank you! :pray::skin-tone-5:

Hi, a question on adding companies via API
Currently we have an integration that tries to do the matching via emails and domains, but we actually have companies that use the same domain for regional branches.
<http://bigcompany.com|bigcompany.com> < Asia/Pacific
<http://bigcompany.com|bigcompany.com> < US
When we try to insert the second company it won't work.

Another scenario that HS currently rejects is:
<http://domain.com/asia/en|domain.com/asia/en>  <<

Are there any advice or best practices on this?
